macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: S&P 500 Hits All-Time High on Holiday-Thinned Trading
items.summary: The S&P 500 closed at a new all-time high of 6,932, up 0.3%, amid light holiday volume described as a 'Santa Claus Rally.' Dow Jones rose 0.6% to 48,731, Nasdaq up 0.2% to 23,613, and Russell 2000 up 0.3% to 2,548.

items.title: US Stock Indexes Rise to Records on Christmas Eve
items.summary: Major US indexes advanced on a holiday-shortened session: S&P 500 +0.3%, Dow +0.6%, Nasdaq +0.2%, with markets closed for Christmas. Year-to-date, S&P 500 is up 17.8%, Nasdaq 22.3%.

items.title: Santa Claus Rally Underway as S&P 500 Gains 5 Straight Days
items.summary: S&P 500 marked five consecutive gains to all-time highs on low volume, kicking off the seasonal Santa Claus Rally (last 5 trading days of year plus first two of next, historically up 76% of time). Nearly all S&P sectors higher YTD, led by Technology +25.6%.

items.title: VIX Hits 2025 Lows Supporting Bullish Stock Outlook
items.summary: Cboe Volatility Index (VIX) fell to new 2025 lows and 52-week lows, maintaining buy signals alongside equity put-call ratios on buy signals. S&P 500 breakout above 6,920 eyed for further gains.

items.title: US Unemployment Claims Fall, Signaling Healthy Labor Market
items.summary: Initial unemployment claims dropped last week, indicating a robust US labor market amid investor focus on economy and Fed policy. No major Fed or central bank announcements reported.

items.title: Sanofi to Acquire Dynavax Technologies, Shares Soar
items.summary: Dynavax Technologies stock surged after Sanofi announced plans to buy the vaccine maker. No other significant company earnings or announcements noted in holiday-shortened session.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: OpenAI reportedly launches GPT-5.2 with faster reasoning
items.summary: OpenAI has rolled out GPT-5.2, described in coverage as its fastest reasoning model to date and part of an escalating performance race among large-model providers.

items.title: Google debuts Gemini 3 Flash — speed and efficiency emphasized
items.summary: Google announced Gemini 3 Flash, a model update positioned for higher speed and efficiency across reasoning and multimodal tasks, presented as a competitor to recent OpenAI releases.

items.title: Anthropic publishes 'Claude Skills' library on GitHub
items.summary: Anthropic released an open-source 'Claude Skills' library that provides 50+ standardized, customizable skill workflows covering document processing, development tooling, data/business functions, and creative tasks to enable Claude to execute professional workflows.

items.title: Industry roundup: smart-home struggles, appliance AI integrations, and personal analytics
items.summary: Daily AI coverage highlights issues with generative assistants in smart homes, Samsung integrating Google's Gemini into kitchen appliances, and OpenAI testing personal analytics features for ChatGPT users.

items.title: China pushes AI into basic education as sector grows
items.summary: Chinese localities have expanded compulsory AI curricula across primary and secondary schools as part of a wider national push; the domestic AI sector surpassed 900 billion yuan in 2024 and continues rapid growth, with attention to ethical risks and assessment frameworks.

items.title: Expert commentary: emerging technologies and AI for aging populations
items.summary: Experts say AI and related technologies could transform elderly care and social interaction, citing advances such as brain–computer interfaces and genetic tech as factors reshaping aging and healthcare roles.

items.title: Security outlook: proposals for securing agentic AI in 2026
items.summary: Industry analysis and proof-of-concept work discuss strategies and research directions for securing increasingly agentic AI systems ahead of 2026 deployments, emphasizing MDR (managed detection and response) and integration challenges.

items.title: Analysis: AI magnifies existing data and governance challenges
items.summary: Commentary from a financial-machine-learning forum underscores that while AI brings capabilities, it also amplifies existing data quality, governance, and operational problems across industries.

items.title: Edge AI and simulation engineering trends highlighted for 2025–2026
items.summary: Coverage points to convergence of computational power, physical realism, and AI in simulation engineering and a continuing push of edge AI applications into automotive and industrial markets.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond Now Available on Nintendo Switch and Switch 2
items.summary: Nintendo announces Metroid Prime 4: Beyond is available now on Nintendo Switch and Switch 2, celebrated with My Nintendo rewards including holographic posters, wallpapers, and a Super Mario statue giveaway.

items.title: Rocket League Suffers Major Outages on Christmas Due to Epic Authentication Failure
items.summary: Rocket League experiences widespread connection issues, server outages, and login failures on December 24-25 across all platforms, linked to Epic Online Services authentication problems, frustrating players during the holidays.

items.title: Fortnite Launches Winterfest 2025 and Ballistic v37.10 Update
items.summary: Fortnite kicks off Winterfest 2025 with festive events and introduces Ballistic v37.10 adding the Veiled Precision SMG, Deployable Wall Gadget, and more, alongside Fortnite Crew December rewards.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: Nvidia strikes deal to license Groq technology, hires Groq leadership amid reports of $20B asset purchase
items.summary: Nvidia reached a non‑exclusive licensing agreement with chip rival Groq and is hiring Groq founder Jonathan Ross and other executives; media reports said Nvidia is purchasing Groq assets for about $20 billion, though Nvidia described the deal as licensing rather than a full acquisition.

items.title: Neurable raises $35M Series A to commercialize wearable brain‑computer interface tech
items.summary: Neurable closed a $35 million Series A to accelerate deployment of wearable brain‑computer interface products aimed at tracking mental fatigue, cognitive recovery, and focus state detection for everyday use.

items.title: Rocket League experiences massive global outage affecting logins and matchmaking
items.summary: Psyonix is investigating a major outage that left Rocket League players unable to log in or access matchmaking across regions on December 24–25, 2025.

items.title: Nextech3D.ai provides update on Krafty Labs acquisition, closing scheduled for Jan 2, 2026
items.summary: Nextech3D.ai confirmed due diligence for its acquisition of Krafty Labs is complete and the transaction is expected to close January 2, 2026, positioning the buyer to expand its event‑tech offerings and enterprise customer base.
items.source: Investing News Network (press release via Accesswire)

items.title: ScienceDaily highlights new 3D chip that stacks memory and compute to address AI bottlenecks
items.summary: Researchers reported a 3D chip design that vertically stacks memory and compute elements to speed data movement inside chips, a development presented as promising for overcoming major AI compute bottlenecks.

items.title: Industry roundups: tech trends and executive moves reported across outlets
items.summary: Multiple outlets published year‑end and personnel coverage including CXOToday's review of 2025 tech trends (agentic AI, embodied tech, progress in quantum) and corporate board/leadership appointments reported in sector press.
